name: Sneeze Hell
description:
-- WELCOME TO SNEEZE HELL --

Sneeze Hell is a top view shooter game that incorporates bullet hell mechanics into various aspects of the game! The enemy shoots bullets like crazy, you shoot bullets like crazy, everyone wins!

-- EVERY 10 SECONDS YOU SNEEZE --

Yes, and maybe that could be troublesome... If not by the fact that your sneeze is so powerful THAT IT CAN LITERALLY VAPORIZE ENEMIES!

-- HOW TO PLAY --

The tutorial is already on the game you dummy, but just in case:
WASD - Movement // Left Mouse Click - Shoot // Mouse Movement - Aim // ESC - Pause

(This game at its current state has no full gamepad support)

-- BULLET HELL JAM SUBMISSION --

This game is a submission to the Bullet Hell Jam, made in a time period of a week between April 15th to April 22th.

Programming, Art, Game Design, SFX and VFX were all made by me (KMajima). Credits to Waterflame for the music, as licensed for personal use and no commercial gain, with attribution:

Final Battle by Waterflame

Disposition by Waterflame

Gabberfly by Waterflame

Electroman Adventures v2 by Waterflame

Octagon Force by Waterflame

Grind District by Waterflame

-- WARNING --

This game may have flashing lights included. Discretion is advised.
